example: I arrive in Guatemala on The Day of the Dead

meaning: tò mò, hiếu kỳ, thọc mạch

example: I’m curious about this holiday, so I go to the cemetery to see what’s happening.
The atmosphere is like a party. There are people everywhere
Families are sitting around the graves of their dead ancestors
Families are sitting around the graves of their dead ancestors

meaning: ngắm nhìn một cách vui thích
example: I walk through the cemetery and admire the beauty of all the colorful flowers.
There is also color in the sky, because many kids are flying kites
In the Unites States, cemeteries are always somber. We certainly never have festivals or parties next to graves.
I find that I prefer the Guatemalan approach

meaning: đánh giá đúng, đánh giá cao, hiểu rõ giá trị
example: Guatemalans call it “The Day of the Dead”, but it is also a day to appreciate life.

meaning: chấp nhận sự thật của cái gì; thừa nhận cái gì
example: I like that they acknowledge death, instead of denying it the way Americans do
